name: Lost In Space: The Frontier
description:
Project #2-1
Lost In Space : The Frontier

Your Journey is not here.

Your Planets,
Your Citizens,
Your Dream,
none of them are not here.

You lost all...

--------------------------------------------------
Epic! Endless! Long journey!

Point1. Build a lot of fleets(More than a hundreds)
and kill all the enemies.

Point2. Collect Blue Prints and Open New Fleets!

Point3. Conquer Enemy and take ours back from enemies.

Point4. Open map with massive battles!!

--------------------------------------------------

Please leave us your precious feedback!
We will keep updating it!
